name: Bull Cows Word Guessing Game
description: A word guessing game - a cow is a correct letter in the wrong spot, a bull is a correct letter in the right spot. This is based on Udemy's https://www.udemy.com/course/unrealcourse/ Bull Cow game - I added extra options which aren't featured in the original project like varying number of letters for the word, player help options to display a partial word based on the correct letters in the correct positions and also a display of the letters which are correct but in the incorrect position.
